content.text: Match ends, Barcelona B 4, Granada CF 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona B 4, Granada CF 0.
Odion Ighalo (Granada CF) is shown the yellow card.
Second yellow card to Allan Nyom (Granada CF) for a bad foul.
Foul by Allan Nyom (Granada CF).
Abraham Minero (Barcelona B) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Abraham Minero (Barcelona B).
Allan Nyom (Granada CF) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Corner,  Barcelona B. Conceded by Manuel Lucena.
Attempt saved. Saúl Berjón (Barcelona B) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Alexandre Geijo (Granada CF) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Martín Montoya (Barcelona B) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alexandre Geijo (Granada CF).
Substitution, Granada CF. Rubén Párraga replaces Dani Benítez.
Goal!  Barcelona B 4, Granada CF 0. Sergi Roberto (Barcelona B) header from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Víctor Vázquez with a through ball.
Attempt saved. Carlos Calvo (Granada CF) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Alexandre Geijo.
Substitution, Barcelona B. Saúl Berjón replaces Nolito.
Substitution, Barcelona B. Ilie Sánchez replaces Jonathan dos Santos.
Foul by Abraham Minero (Barcelona B).
Juande (Granada CF) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Barcelona B 3, Granada CF 0. Jonatan Soriano (Barcelona B) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Víctor Vázquez.
Offside, Barcelona B. Abraham Minero tries a through ball, but Nolito is caught offside.
Substitution, Granada CF. Odion Ighalo replaces Abel Gómez.
Attempt saved. Dani Benítez (Granada CF) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

Second Half begins Barcelona B 2, Granada CF 0.
Substitution, Granada CF. Carlos Calvo replaces Fabián Orellana.
First Half ends, Barcelona B 2, Granada CF 0.
Goal!  Barcelona B 2, Granada CF 0. Jonatan Soriano (Barcelona B) header from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jonathan dos Santos with a cross following a corner.
